Event: Ha-ha abbreviate it , so it`s not so bulky
Post: Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to make broad, global attributions about oneself or others based on a single event or trait. Now, please provide me with the Event you'd like me to generate a GAS social media post for.

Event: my knees are sore after physio
Post: "My knees are sore after physio, which means I'm probably going to be in pain for the rest of my life and never be able to enjoy activities again."
